name: Fruit Escape: Draw Line
description:
Fruit Escape: Draw Line

Fruit Escape is a simple, funny and colorful physical drawing game with hundreds of interesting puzzles. You have just draw lines with your finger. Draw as many lines as needed to guide a fruit into the portal. Sometimes it is not so easy to solve a puzzle as it seems at first glance. But you can draw lines over and over and actually learn from your mistakes. So you will find that persistence, creativity and logical thinking will help you cope with any task. Fruit Escape is the best way to train your brain and problem solving skill, at the same time with your wisdom and imaginations you will become a master. Fruit Escape is a mind game to get you think quick, it's a good way to wind down and chill.

Features:
  • 100% family game
  • kids friendly interface
  • interesting levels
  • colourful graphics
  • joyful music and sound effects
